text: John Adriaan 'Ian' Groenewald (born ) is a South African rugby union player for in the Currie Cup and the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is lock. He made his Currie Cup debut for Griquas in July 2019, starting their opening match of the 2019 season against the at lock. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1992 births Middelburg Category:Rugby union locks Category:Griquas rugby union players Category:Western Province (rugby team) players
title: Ian Groenewald
